title: How to Do an Egg White Mask

steps.title: Take a small covered plastic container,.
steps.content: Take a small covered plastic container,. .like a small butter tub....crack an egg white, no yolk, in it.

steps.title: Every day for 3 or 4 days..
steps.content: Every day for 3 or 4 days.. .wet your face, touch your fingertips to a small amount of egg white,...smooth over your face. Let dry until you look like a wrinkled old woman...then wash off.

steps.title: Cover the tub and put it in fridge.
steps.content: Cover the tub and put it in fridge. Use for two weeks, pour it out and put a new egg white in it.

steps.title: Repeat once a week or so..
steps.content: Repeat once a week or so.. .the protein tends to 'feed' your face with no chemicals, cleans pores..tightens skin...
